name: Austria Motel

reviews.text: We stayed in a room that had such amazing views over the Bay, it was so nice to wake up to. Owners/reception staff were so, so friendly and helpful. They recommended the best fish and chip shop I think I ever been to in Mangonui!!
reviews.title: I'd stay here again...
Yay!
reviews.text: A excellent base for exploring Northland, also Waitangi is close (where the Crown signed a treaty with the Maori).

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A delightful motel, with friendly, helpful hosts. We stayed in the highest room, with great views over the bay, and a large balcony to sit out and enjoy the sights. Good location just behind the main street, comfortable bed, huge bathroom - what more could you need?
reviews.title: We were sorry to leave

reviews.text: The hosts were lovely! They even carried our bags up a couple of flights of stairs to the unit, and offered to bring them down in the morning.
reviews.title: Fit the bill

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The 2 bedroom unit had views from all rooms - kitchen, lounge and 2 bedrooms it was well positioned. I booked this unit on the internet cheap and it meet my expectations. It was clean and accomadated us all (5 adults and an 8 month old).
reviews.title: Great view of Bay of Islands

reviews.text: It was also a easy walk to the main street and wharf which was great. It was definitely value for money and clean - no complaints from me!
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.text: We stayed in the penthouse studio which has a lovely covered deck facing out to the sea.
reviews.title: Overpriced average motel with worn out decor

aka: Austria Motel Paihia, Bay Of Islands
description: A small family run motel. Units are self-contained, serviced daily and are very spacious with Sky TV and queen size beds. All with balconies that get the afternoon sun. We are in central Paihia, one street back from the busy main road, about 90 metres from the restaurants and wharf.
